item.description:
Come on back to join us for the release of Monster Manual 2 in May! While the format remains the same as the previous Game Days, this time the monsters are the stars, showing off some of the bad guys your D&D party can expect to face from Monster Manual 2. One iconic D&D monster makes his return to the game through the 5th-level adventure Journey through the Silver Caves. Be one of the first to beat down some new baddies when you come to play in this event!

Pre-generated characters, quick start rules and player miniatures will all be provided along with light refreshments!

Every one who attends will be entered to win a copy of a R.A. Salvatore novel featuring the legendary Drizzt Do'Urden which Wizards has provided us to give away!

Bring your dice (or borrow some when you get here) and have a blast! New players are welcome!
item.name: Worldwide D&D Game Day - Monster Manual 2
